name: Toy Box
description: This toy box was once painted in cheerful primary colors, but weather and time have reduced it to flaking remnants. The lid is carved with images of children playingâ€”or possibly dancing, or possibly running from something just out of frame. The hinges squeak when you open it, a sound like a small animal in distress. Inside, beneath a layer of what you hope is just dust, you can see various items nestled among broken toys: a one-eyed doll, wooden blocks with letters that don't form words in any language you know, and a wind-up monkey that occasionally clicks even though no one has wound it.
